Provo.Stephen and Mary Bunnell House:
The Stephen and Mary Bunnell House at 970 S. 800 West, on the Utah Valley State College campus, Orem, Utah was built in 1892. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1996.
It was the farmhouse of a 60-acre (24 ha) farm with an orchard; it is now within the college campus.
